SEARCH
Package ch.zhaw.mathify.model

Class Scoreboard

java.lang.Object
ch.zhaw.mathify.model.Scoreboard
public class Scoreboard extends Object
This class represents an AVL-tree that stores the user's data in the scoreboard.

  • Nested Class Summary
